title: Person of Interest - Harold Finch
author: CBS EyeLab
comment: And then Root and Shaw came along and took over the show.  But that's okay, I liked seeing Sarah and Amy kick butt.
description: His name is Harold Finch. He built a secret computer system for the government and is constantly hunted by those who wish to use the machine for their own benefit.  Watch the man behind the machine in 'Person of Interest' Thursdays 9/8c only CBS!
